author.name: Licensed by Woolworths  ©️ Dorling Kindersley Ltd

description: If you like Asian flavours but prefer to avoid heat, simply leave out the chilli. Serve with cauliflower rice.
name: Thaistyle Stirfried Minced Beef Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 100g broccoli, cut very small into florets
1 piece fresh root ginger, 3 cm, finely chopped
1 tbs coriander, finely chopped stalks and a handful of coriander leaves, roughly chopped
1 red chilli, deseeded and finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a large pan of salted water to the boil and blanch the broccoli for 1 minute, then drain and refresh it under cold water. Set aside.

Heat the sunflower oil in a wok or a large, deepsided frying pan. Add the spring onions, garlic, ginger, coriander stalks, and chilli (if using), and fry for a couple of minutes until coloured slightly.
Add the minced beef and continue to fry over a high heat until the meat is well browned.
Return the broccoli and add the fish sauce, soy sauce, lime juice, and sugar. Mix well, cooking for a minute or 2 until the broccoli is piping hot. Stir in the coriander leaves and serve with rice.
